title: Watson Data Platform Form Schema
description: Form schema for the Watson Data Platform

componentId.description: The type of the component being edited.

labelEditable.description: True if the label can be edited. False if the label should be readonly.

pixelWidth.description: Gives more control of editor panel width. The panel is shown at min size if editorSize is small (and max size if editorSize is medium) with a resize button. If min and max are the same no sizing button is displayed.

min.description: Minimum size in pixels for the right side editor flyout

max.description: Maximum size in pixels for the right side editor flyout

buttons.description: List of buttons that should appear in the UI. Currently ignored.

data.description: Additional data such as initial settings and data schema.

ui_item_definition.description: UI item definition that represents a basic element in the UI

tabs.description: List of tab definitions for 'primaryTab' and 'secondaryTab' items.

textType.description: When set, adds additional styling and icon to 'text'

secondaryText.description: Secondary text associated with the sub-panel shown when an 'additionalLink' is clicked.

dependsOn.description: Specifies a parameter name (usually associated with a boolean or enumerated value) whose control value this item depends on.

insertPanels.description: Indicates whether panels, contained with a panelSelector, should be inserted between the radio buttons of a radio button set indicated by the dependsOn parameter.

nestedPanel.description: Indicate whether panel should be nested. Nested panels are indented by 16px from the left and display left border. Default is false.

className.description: Optional class name to set for this uiItem

group.description: The parameter group being displayed in the tab

content.description: The UI item to be shown.

uiItems.description: List of UI items in this panel.

parameters.description: List of parameters for the custom panel

data.description: Data passed to customPanel when panelType=custom

control_definition.description: Defines a control that is used to edit a parameter.

name.description: The name of the parameter that can be edited by this control.

label.description: The control label and any associated shortcuts. This may also be used for accessibility reasons so must be provided even if the control doesn't show the label.

labelVisible.description: Whether the label should be shown. Typically checkboxes don't have a separate label although this can be over-ridden.

valueDef.description: The basic metadata about the parameter associated with the control.

role.description: The additional information about the role as defined by the parameter declaration.

increment.description: Determines the increment/decrement value for the spinner control only

additionalText.description: The additional text to be shown close to the control.

orientation.description: Defines the flow of any sub-controls e.g. radio buttons or checkboxes.

values.description: For enumerated types, this defines the set of valid values.

valueLabels.description: For enumerated types, this defines the set of labels for the valid values. The ordering must be consistent with the order in the 'values' attribute.

valueIcons.description: For enumerated types, this defines the set of icons for the valid values. The ordering must be consistent with the order in the 'values' attribute.

moveableRows.description: For structure types, determines if rows can be moved up or down in a table

row_selection.description: Determines how many rows can be selected at a time. 'multiple-edit': select multiple rows and allow the editing of column values for all selected rows.

subControls.description: For structure types, this defines the control information for sub-parameters. Used to render the table columns and the sub-panel.

keyIndex.description: For structure/tabular controls, indicates which column index is the key (-1 indicates no key).

defaultRow.description: For structure/tabular controls, specifies the initial values for the new row/structure (e.g. when a '+' button is pressed).

noPickColumns.description: Suppresses Add/Remove Columns from structure tables residing within columnSelection or columnAllocation panels

childItem.description: The basic metadata about the parameter associated with the control.

editStyle.description: Editing style of elements in a table

summary.description: Determines if this column values will be shown in the summaryPanel

required.description: True when this parameter must be provided in order to execute.

customControlId.description: Used to determine which custom control to use when controlType=custom.

data.description: Data passed to custom control when controlType=custom

dateFormat.description: A format string such as YYYY-MM-DD which describes the display and entry format for a date field.

timeFormat.description: A format string such as HH:mm:ss which describes the display and entry format for a time field.

rows.description: Number of rows to display in tables

header.description: Determines if the table header should be displayed

dmDefault.description: Used within complex structures containing 'column' key_definition fields. This associates the subControl parameter with a field attribute in the current record schema.

dmImage.description: This can be set to display an icon of the corresponding dm type in the `role`:`column' field of a table.

includeAllFields.description: Set to true to include all fields in the control at all times

layout.description: Array of rows containing structure element names

items.description: A single row of structure parameter names for laying out horizontally
A parameter name within the current structure

visible.description: Whether the table showing the structures includes a column for this sub-parameter for subControls

width.description: Suggested width of the column in the table that shows the current value for subControls.

displayChars.description: Limits the number of characters displayed for a text field in a column in a table.  The text will have an ellipsis appended at this limit.

sortable.description: Determines if this column values can be sorted into ascending/descending order in a table

filterable.description: Determines if this column values can be filtered so that only rows that match the filter in column values are shown in the table

language.description: The language for the expression editor syntax highlight and autocomplete workds. Applies to expression control type.

customValueAllowed.description: Determines if a dropdown, outside of a table, can allow a custom value to be entered

className.description: Optional class name to set for this control

light.description: The background color of controls such as text input. Can be set at the Common Properties level for all or at the control

number_generator.description: Adds a number generation button beside the numeric control

label.description: Number generator button label. It is visible on hover.

isList.description: Whether the value is represented as a list.

isMap.description: Whether the value is represented as a map.

action_definition.description: Defines a action that is used to callback to the application.

label.description: The action label.  Usually the label on a button.

description.description: Defines a action description. Used for tooltip.

image.description: Properties for how the image will look.  Use when control=image.

url.description: image url to be used for action

button_definition.description: Defines a button and any associated callback.

isPrimary.description: Whether the button is the primary/default button.

url.description: The endpoint to be called when the button is pressed.

form_data_definition.description: Additional data such as initial settings and input data schema.

currentParameters.description: Current parameter set upon input. Keys are parameter names, values are their values.
